MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the L6 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Kelso Road, Onslow Road, Parton Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.57AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the work required to repair a damaged underground cable caused by a third party and our team are now working to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.05PM on 18th February 2021.
